languages.text: "Ты, наверное, говоришь про Царя ледяных троллей? Удивительно, что ты слыхал{mf||а} о нем. Но его давным давно сразил Харальд Волчья смерть, когда чудовище обрушилось на клан Гончих прилива. Великую сагу сложили о той охоте, люблю петь ее на пирах... Нет, не угадал{mf||а}".

"You speak of the Ice Troll King, I think? I am surprised you have heard of him. But he was slain long ago by Harald Deathwolf when the monster descended upon the Tide Hounds. A great saga was crafted from that hunt, one I like to sing at feasts... But no, you are wrong."
languages.original_text: "Ты, наверное, говоришь про Царя ледяных троллей? Удивительно, что ты слыхал{mf||а} о нем. Но его давным давно сразил Харальд Волчья смерть, когда чудовище обрушилось на клан Гончих прилива. Великую сагу сложили о той охоте, люблю петь ее на пирах... Нет, не угадал{mf||а}".

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You speak of the Ice Troll King, I think? I am surprised you have heard of him. But he was slain long ago by Harald Deathwolf when the monster descended upon the Tide Hounds. A great saga was crafted from that hunt, one I like to sing at feasts... But no, you are wrong."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “你说的应该是冰霜巨魔之王吧？我很惊讶，你居然听说过这个名字。不过，他很久之前出现在潮汐猎犬氏族的时候，就被哈拉德·戴斯沃夫杀死了。吟游诗人还根据这场狩猎撰写了伟大的史诗，那首史诗我很喜欢在宴会的时候唱……不过，不对，这个答案错了。”
languages.original_text: "You speak of the Ice Troll King, I think? I am surprised you have heard of him. But he was slain long ago by Harald Deathwolf when the monster descended upon the Tide Hounds. A great saga was crafted from that hunt, one I like to sing at feasts... But no, you are wrong."

traits.locale_text: “你说的应该是冰霜巨魔之王吧？我很惊讶，你居然听说过这个名字。不过，他很久之前出现在潮汐猎犬氏族的时候，就被哈拉德·戴斯沃夫杀死了。吟游诗人还根据这场狩猎撰写了伟大的史诗，那首史诗我很喜欢在宴会的时候唱……不过，不对，这个答案错了。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Se refiere al rey de los trolls de hielo? Me sorprende que haya oído hablar de él. Pero fue abatido hace mucho por Harald Lobo de muerte cuando atacó a los Sabuesos de la Marea. A raíz de esa cacería nació una de mis sagas favoritas para las fiestas... pero no, se equivoca».
languages.original_text: "You speak of the Ice Troll King, I think? I am surprised you have heard of him. But he was slain long ago by Harald Deathwolf when the monster descended upon the Tide Hounds. A great saga was crafted from that hunt, one I like to sing at feasts... But no, you are wrong."

traits.locale_text: «Se refiere al rey de los trolls de hielo? Me sorprende que haya oído hablar de él. Pero fue abatido hace mucho por Harald Lobo de muerte cuando atacó a los Sabuesos de la Marea. A raíz de esa cacería nació una de mis sagas favoritas para las fiestas... pero no, se equivoca».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「アイストロール・キングのことだな？聞いたことがあるとは驚きだ。だがヤツは昔、ハラルド・デスウルフがタイドハウンドに襲いかかった時に殺された。その時の狩りは素晴らしいサーガとして語り継がれているが…違う」
languages.original_text: "You speak of the Ice Troll King, I think? I am surprised you have heard of him. But he was slain long ago by Harald Deathwolf when the monster descended upon the Tide Hounds. A great saga was crafted from that hunt, one I like to sing at feasts... But no, you are wrong."

traits.locale_text: 「アイストロール・キングのことだな？聞いたことがあるとは驚きだ。だがヤツは昔、ハラルド・デスウルフがタイドハウンドに襲いかかった時に殺された。その時の狩りは素晴らしいサーガとして語り継がれているが…違う」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr sprecht vom Eistrollkönig, nehme ich an? Es überrascht mich, dass Ihr von ihm gehört habt. Doch er wurde vor langer Zeit von Harald Deathwolf getötet, als das Monster über die Gezeitenjäger herfiel. Diese Jagd wurde zu einer großen Saga, die ich gerne bei Festen singe ... Aber nein, Ihr irrt Euch."
languages.original_text: "You speak of the Ice Troll King, I think? I am surprised you have heard of him. But he was slain long ago by Harald Deathwolf when the monster descended upon the Tide Hounds. A great saga was crafted from that hunt, one I like to sing at feasts... But no, you are wrong."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr sprecht vom Eistrollkönig, nehme ich an? Es überrascht mich, dass Ihr von ihm gehört habt. Doch er wurde vor langer Zeit von Harald Deathwolf getötet, als das Monster über die Gezeitenjäger herfiel. Diese Jagd wurde zu einer großen Saga, die ich gerne bei Festen singe ... Aber nein, Ihr irrt Euch."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Vous voulez sans doute parler du roi des trolls des glaces ? Je suis étonné que vous ayez eu vent de son existence. Mais il fut occis il y a longtemps par Harald Deathwolf lorsque le monstre osa s'en prendre aux Limiers de la Marée. Une grande saga fut tirée de cette chasse, que j'adore chanter lors des banquets... Mais non, vous vous trompez. »
languages.original_text: "You speak of the Ice Troll King, I think? I am surprised you have heard of him. But he was slain long ago by Harald Deathwolf when the monster descended upon the Tide Hounds. A great saga was crafted from that hunt, one I like to sing at feasts... But no, you are wrong."

traits.locale_text: « Vous voulez sans doute parler du roi des trolls des glaces ? Je suis étonné que vous ayez eu vent de son existence. Mais il fut occis il y a longtemps par Harald Deathwolf lorsque le monstre osa s'en prendre aux Limiers de la Marée. Une grande saga fut tirée de cette chasse, que j'adore chanter lors des banquets... Mais non, vous vous trompez. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "You speak of the Ice Troll King, I think? I am surprised you have heard of him. But he was slain long ago by Harald Deathwolf when the monster descended upon the Tide Hounds. A great saga was crafted from that hunt, one I like to sing at feasts... But no, you are wrong."

languages.text: "Buz Trolü Kralı'ndan bahsediyorsun sanırım. Onun hakkında bilgi sahibi olmana şaşırdım. Uzun zaman önce bir canavar Medcezir Tazıları'na saldırdığında Harald Ölümkurdu tarafından öldürüldü. Bu avın ardından büyük bir destan şekillendi, ziyafetlerde de sık sık anlatırım. Fakat hayır, bilemedin."
languages.original_text: "You speak of the Ice Troll King, I think? I am surprised you have heard of him. But he was slain long ago by Harald Deathwolf when the monster descended upon the Tide Hounds. A great saga was crafted from that hunt, one I like to sing at feasts... But no, you are wrong."

traits.locale_text: "Buz Trolü Kralı'ndan bahsediyorsun sanırım. Onun hakkında bilgi sahibi olmana şaşırdım. Uzun zaman önce bir canavar Medcezir Tazılarına saldırdığında Harald Ölümkurdu tarafından öldürüldü. Bu avın ardından büyük bir destan şekillendi, ziyafetlerde sık sık anlatırım. Fakat hayır, yanılıyorsun."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
